articles.description: George Russell finished third at the Canadian Grand Prix and left Montreal with mixed feelings despite Mercedes' significant progress.
articles.title: Canadian Grand Prix: 2024: George Russell rues 'missed opportunity' for Mercedes

articles.description: India's match against Pakistan at the T20 World Cup shows that cricket has arrived in the United States and the sport is gathering momentum.
articles.title: India vs Pakistan: T20 World Cup game shows cricket has arrived in the United States

articles.description: Red Bull’s Max Verstappen wins a gripping wet-dry Canadian Grand Prix that developed into a five-car battle for the lead over the final 10 laps.
articles.title: Canadian Grand Prix 2024 result: Max Verstappen wins from Lando Norris

articles.description: French Open winner Carlos Alcaraz plans to have a tattoo of iconic landmark the Eiffel Tower as a permanent reminder of the tournament he loved as a child.
articles.title: French Open 2024: Carlos Alcaraz plans Eiffel Tower tattoo after Roland Garros win

articles.description: Scottie Scheffler holds off Collin Morikawa to win the PGA Tour's Memorial Tournament - his fifth title of the year.
articles.title: Scottie Scheffler wins PGA Tour's Memorial Tournament to claim fifth title of 2024

articles.description: Scotland race to a comprehensive seven-wicket victory over Oman at the T20 World Cup to go top of Group B.
articles.title: T20 World Cup: Scotland thrash Oman to boost Super 8s hopes

articles.description: Captain Harry Kane says England's 1-0 defeat against Iceland at Wembley on Friday “could be a nice wake-up call” ahead of Euro 2024.
articles.title: England: Harry Kane says Iceland defeat could be 'nice wake-up call'

articles.description: The New York Mets produce a thrilling 6-5 comeback win over rivals the Philadelphia Phillies to level Major League Baseball's two-game London Series.
articles.title: MLB London Series: New York Mets edge Philadelphia Phillies to level two-game series

articles.description: Live text and radio commentary as Wales visit Slovakia in an international friendly on Sunday.
articles.title: Slovakia vs Wales: Live text and radio coverage of the international friendly

articles.description: Former Liverpool and Scotland defender Alan Hansen, who was a BBC football pundit for over 20 years, is "seriously ill in hospital".
articles.title: Alan Hansen: Former Liverpool and Scotland defender 'seriously ill'
